ygData.subject: New Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, looks like we get a couple of new mez songs plus some Ancient Songs. I also think we got hosed on the DoT stacking issues.  Figures they would not put in
ygData.messageBody:
Well,
looks like we get a couple of new mez songs plus some Ancient Songs.
I also think we got hosed on the DoT stacking issues. Figures they
would not put in any effort to make the damage portion of our songs
stack w/o having the debuff portion stack.

Anyone had a chance to yet locate the new level 58 song? The patch
message makes it look like it will be a quest??

I also wonder off what uber mob the ancient songs will drop. Lcea
would be the logical candidate but she doesn't seem to be difficult
enough for a mob to drop ancient songs.

Rosha "Spellsinger" Cristi
Lvl 60
Innoruuk
